Name: Traveling Doctor's Handkerchief
Title: Medical Practice: Traveling Doctor's Handkerchief
Desc: "Come sun or rain, nothing could stay the traveling doctor's steps."

Talent.Name: Traveling Doctor's Handkerchief
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After the character uses an Elemental Burst:</color> Heal all your characters for 1 HP. (Once per Round)\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)
